"Kirishima": "You're willing to help? I appreciate it."
"You see, just recently one of our investigators was left behind inside the power plant."
"From what I hear, she fell behind as the team was fleeing from a DOLLS ambush..."
"Chitose is her name; she's one of the trainees I've been looking after."
"We were able to pick up her vitals, and can confirm she's uninjured. However, due to some malfunction with her Mag, we can't contact her."
"Other troops are currently en route to rescue her. ...Alas, they seem to be short-staffed."
"So I'd like to enlist your help. Please see that she comes home safely."
"I would love to come along with you, but with my strength, I'd probably just be holding you back..."
"I've sent Chitose's last known location to your Mag. Good luck out there!"
